data.text: @LadytronFashion Rubbish. I had it a couple of weeks ago and luckily it wasn't too bad (although it's lingering). Hope you and the missis are OK xxx
@LadytronFashion Erm… He’s just thrown my supper against the wall and is snarling at me.
@bearingwest I would strongly advise against that.
@LadytronFashion I’ll ask about his mummy then. #DontSayMother
@LadytronFashion That’s fine. I say mom not mother.

@bearingwest Anthony's okay.
Just don't ask him about his mother.
@LadytronFashion Fwank gets most things wrong sadly. You’ll get to notice that. Anthony looks scary!

@bearingwest I think he got the high press wrong against Spurs, but I like Frank.
Our problem is simple.
Many of the players in the squad just aren't skilful or mentally strong enough.

I have arranged for Anthony to bring your food packs.
Anthony has made a spoon for you & may bring a friend https://t.co/OxveTNj7KH
